abstract: Danny Meyer, the principal owner of the Manhattan restaurant that has been the cynosure of his empire, confirmed speculation that he intended to sell.
snippet: Danny Meyer, the principal owner of the Manhattan restaurant that has been the cynosure of his empire, confirmed speculation that he intended to sell.
lead_paragraph: It may be the first time a foreword to a cookbook has confirmed hot restaurant news.

headline.main: Meyer Intends to Sell Eleven Madison Park to Its Chef and Manager
